mapper.sql: Id, RegionId, EquipName, PhysicalEquipType, RouteCode, Mile, Channel, Width, Height, Ip, Port, SerialPortNumber, BaudRate, Parity, DataBits, StopBits, BusinessCategory, ProtocolId, IsDeleted, InUse, CreateDate, CreateTime
mapper.select:
select a.Id, a.RouteCode, a.BusinessCategory, a.CreateTime from T_CMS_Equip a INNER JOIN T_RegionInfo b ON a.RegionId = b.Id WHERE a.IsDeleted = 0 AND a.InUse = 1
AND SUBSTRING(b.RegionCode,1,#{map.prefixLength}) = SUBSTRING(#{map.regionCode,jdbcType=NCHAR},1,#{map.prefixLength})
mapper.insert: insert into T_CMS_Equip (Id, RegionId, EquipName, PhysicalEquipType, RouteCode, Mile, Channel, Width, Height, Ip, Port, SerialPortNumber, BaudRate, Parity, DataBits, StopBits, BusinessCategory, ProtocolId, IsDeleted, InUse, CreateDate, CreateTime, ConcurrencyToken) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{regionid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{equipname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{physicalequiptype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{routecode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{mile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialportnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baudrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{databits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stopbits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businesscategory,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{protocolid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{inuse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{concurrencytoken,jdbcType=BINARY})

mapper.update:
update T_CMS_Equip
RegionId = #{regionid,jdbcType=CHAR},
EquipName = #{equipname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PhysicalEquipType = #{physicalequiptype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RouteCode = #{routecode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Mile = #{mile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Width = #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Ip = #{ip,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SerialPortNumber = #{serialportnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BaudRate = #{baudrate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Parity = #{parity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DataBits = #{databits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
StopBits = #{stopbits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BusinessCategory = #{businesscategory,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ProtocolId = #{protocolid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
InUse = #{inuse,jdbcType=BIT},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME},
ConcurrencyToken = #{concurrencytoken,jdbcType=BINARY},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
